attributes.action: LIFE in prison for PAEDOPHILE Ian Watkins and mothers A and B.
attributes.additional_details:
Disgustingly poison acts can take place in this world by a child's own mother.

This is worse than anything I have ever heard in my life and brought me to tears when reading 'Daily Mail' story about 'Lostprophets' singer 'Ian Watkins' and 'mother A' and 'mother B.' I think a firm decision had to be made by the justice system in order for Britain to maintain any type of faith in it.

I am urging as many people to sign this petition and protect our world.
